channel.title: World
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from World, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Luigi Mangione appears in court as lawyers ask judge to toss evidence
item.description: Alleged gunman faces nine charges including second-degree murder in New York state case Luigi Mangione is appeared in Manhattan state court on Monday ...

item.title: OBR says its inadvertent release of budget report is ‘worst failure’ in its 15-year history – UK politics live
item.description: Office for Budget Responsibility says Rachel Reeves ‘had every right to expect that the [report] would not be publicly available until she sat down at...

item.title: Can Keir Starmer save Rachel Reeves? – podcast
item.description: Pippa and Kiran discuss the prime minister’s speech on Monday and ask whether it will take attention away from allegations that the chancellor misled ...

item.title: Zelenskyy says Ukraine peace must be ‘durable’ after Macron talks as US team head to Moscow – Europe live
item.description: Ukrainian president embarks on busy week of diplomacy as US ups pressure to end war UK prime minister Keir Starmer is delivering a major economy speec...

item.title: Two senior Met police spies were ‘horribly and incredibly racist’, inquiry told
item.description: Undercover unit monitored Stephen Lawrence’s family, as well as thousands of mainly leftwing political activists Two senior officers who supervised an...

item.title: Regulator backtracks on 'ghost train' plan
item.description: After announcing the popular service would no longer accept passengers the ORR changes its mind.

item.title: Runaway reindeer sparks huge search operation after fleeing festive celebration
item.description: The animal, named Buddy, fled a festive celebration on the coast and went on the run for hours.

item.title: Banquet, Bowie and football in upcoming German state visit
item.description: King Charles this week in Windsor will host the first state visit from Germany for 27 years.

item.title: Weather warnings issued as heavy rain hits the UK with flooding expected
item.description: Parts of the UK could see a month's worth of rainfall in just one day.

item.title: US and UK agree zero tariffs deal on pharmaceuticals
item.description: The deal follows threats of tariffs as high as 100% on branded drug imports.
